channel.title: Version 3.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 3.2.0 (2022-03-19) Cap'n Hugo 0.93.0 0.93.0 This release requires a newer Cap'n Hugo version. Change Change In this release th' Merrrmaid JavaScript library will only be boarded on demand if th' plank contains a Merrrmaid shortcode or be us'n Marrrkdown codefences. This changes th' behavior o' disableMermaid config opt'n as follows: If a Merrrmaid shortcode or Marrrkdown codefence be found, th' opt'n will be ignored an' Merrrmaid will be boarded regardlessly.
